thread.title: Literally Just 16 Pictures Of Half-Naked Guys And Cute Animals
thread.title_full: Literally Just 16 Pictures Of Half-Naked Guys And Cute Animals

author: Pablo Valdivia, Crystal Ro
title: Literally Just 16 Pictures Of Half-Naked Guys And Cute Animals
text:
View this image › 
smoothiethecat / Via instagram.com ID: 10308390 2. And here’s Sachin , giving his best puppy dog eye impression. View this image › 
sachinbhatt / Via Instagram: @www.instagram.com/sachinbhatt/?hl=en ID: 10307142 3. Here’s Starsky , looking a bit more squished than usual. View this image › 
starsky_the_goldie / Via instagram.com ID: 10308222 4. And here’s St. Jon , who’s lookin’ deep into your soul. View this image › 
@st . jon / Via instagram.com ID: 10307517 5. Theodore likes to get adorably messy. View this image › 
theodorable_corgi / Via instagram.com ID: 10307818 6. While Ronnie just wants to get clean. View this image › 
ronniecwoo / Via instagram.com ID: 10307384 7. Bowie is the tiniest fluff of all fluffs. View this image › 
ID: 10308229 8. And Renato has got his own kind of touchable fluff. View this image › 
renijacobs / Via instagram.com ID: 10307795 9. Juniper is a sleepy lil’ bb. View this image › 
instagram.com / Via instagram.com ID: 10307836 10. And Krittarit does one hell of a Juniper impression. View this image › 
bigm_krittarit / Via instagram.com ID: 10308061 11. Sebastian’s got a pouch full of surprises. View this image › 
thekangaroosanctuary / Via Instagram: @thekangaroosanctuary ID: 10308373 12. Even though Petros’ polka dot pouch holds…well…an even bigger surprise. View this image › 
petros_sp / Via instagram.com ID: 10308139 13. Coco really loves to ~chill~ out. View this image › 
cocolog_cat / Via instagram.com ID: 10308206 14. But Julian can actually get shit done. View this image › 
ijulian_ / Via instagram.com ID: 10308353 15. Thor just wants to be cuddled. View this image › 
joandthoradventures / Via instagram.com ID: 10307868 16. And Travis will do all the cuddling you need. View this image › 
travbeachboy / Via instagram.com ID: 10307977
